articles.title: DPRK High-Level Delegation to Visit S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK High-Level Delegation to Visit S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A high-level delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea headed by Kim Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, will visit south Korea to participate in the closing ceremony of the 23rd Winter Olympics.

articles.title: DPRK High-Level Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK High-Level Delegation Leaves 
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A high-level delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea headed by Kim Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, left here on Sunday to participate in the closing ceremony of the 23rd Winter Olympics.
					 The delegation includes Ri Son Gwon, chairman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country, and other suite members.
					
					 After arriving Kaesong, it headed for the south side's area at around 09:30.

articles.title: Greetings to Kuwait Emir
articles.content:
Greetings to Kuwait Emir
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Sabah Al－Ahmad Al－Jaber Al-Sabah, emir of the State of Kuwait, on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of its independence and the 27th anniversary of its liberation.
					 Kim in his message wished the emir good health and bigger success in his work for the country's development and prosperity, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop in the common interests.

articles.title: U.S. Hit for Bringing Clouds of War to Hang over Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
U.S. Hit for Bringing Clouds of War to Hang over Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK issued the following press statement on Sunday:
					 Respected Supreme Leader Comrade Kim Jong Un affirmed his will in his New Year Address to make strenuous efforts to improve inter-Korean relations, create a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula and ensure a successful holding of Phyongchang Winter Olympics.
					
					 Thanks to our supreme leadership's noble love for the nation and strong determination for peace, long-awaited inter-Korean dialogue and cooperation have been realized and the Olympics took place successfully by the inter-Korean collaboration. 
					
					 However, on the eve of closing of the Olympics, United States is running amok to bring another dark cloud of confrontation and war over the Korean peninsula by announcing enormous sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 Trump has announced new sanctions, the core of which is to completely block the DPRK's maritime trade with other countries, and he openly threatened us by making wild remarks that if the said sanctions do not work, "very rough phase 2" will be operated. 
					
					 Trump group's attempt itself to threaten us by such sanctions or wild remarks only reveals its ignorance about us.
					
					 We came to possess nuclear weapons, the treasured sword of justice, in order to defend ourselves from such threats from the United States. 
					
					 As we have stated on numerous occasions, we will consider any type of blockade an act of war against us, and if U.S. has indeed the guts to confront us in "rough" manner, we will not necessarily take the trouble to stop it.
					
					 If U.S. ignores all of our sincere efforts for improving inter-Korean relations and for preserving peace and stability on the Korean peninsula, as desired by the nation, and doggedly persists instead in provocation against us, we will have a tight grip on U.S. and deal with it with our own way of counteraction, no matter how rough and hysterical the U.S. moves are.
					
					 If tension on the Korean peninsula escalates into a brink of war due to the U.S. reckless actions, all the catastrophic consequences resulting therefrom will be borne by the United States.

articles.title: U.S. Blasted for Hurling Stream of Abuse
articles.content:
U.S. Blasted for Hurling Stream of Abuse
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Trump group is going frantic with the anti-DPRK smear campaign, much upset by the daily-increasing climate of the improvement of inter-Korean ties.
					 U.S. Vice-President Pence said at a conservative group meeting in Maryland State on Feb. 23 that an era of strategic patience for the DPRK ended and the U.S. would show its decisive will until the DPRK stops threatening the U.S. and its allies and totally abandons the nuclear and missile program.
					
					 What is more intolerable is that he dared to describe the first vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, who attended the opening ceremony of the Winter Olympics in south Korea as a congratulatory mission, as "center of vicious regime" or "pillar of oppressive regime".
					
					 In this regard, a spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee on Feb. 24 issued a statement condemning Pence's disgraceful behavior as an act of rogue without an equal in the world.
					
					 Unpardonable are that Pence dared to defame the inviolable DPRK government, terming it "dictatorial regime", and absurdly slandered our congratulatory missions including the first vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, the statement said, adding:
					
					 It is the mettle of our army and people sharing their destinies with their leader and their social system to find out and punish without mercy those insulting the dignity of the supreme leadership and the social system of the DPRK no matter whoever and wherever they are.
					
					 Pence will have a wearing time, witnessing what quagmire his crazy remarks threw the U.S. and himself into.
					
					 Trump, who is taking such bete noire as Pence under his wings, should be well aware that we will never beg for dialogue in any case and, particularly, have no dealings with those viciously slandering the dignity of our supreme leadership and government.
					
					 We will never have face-to-face talks with them even after 100 years or 200 years. This is neither an empty talk nor any threat.
					
					 The U.S. will have to pay dearly for stupid and wild vituperation.

articles.title: KAPPC Urges Japanese Authorities to Prevent Terrorism against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
KAPPC Urges Japanese Authorities to Prevent Terrorism against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee (KAPPC) Sunday issued a statement as regards the fact that in recent days the Japanese authorities and right-wing reactionaries are getting very serious in their hysteria against our Republic and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Around 03:50, Feb. 23 two Japanese right-wingers with arms committed the heinous terrorist crime, firing several bullets at the hall in which Chongryon headquarters.
					
					 The Chongryon Central Standing Committee speaks for the dignity, right and interests of Chongryon organizations and Koreans in Japan and is playing the role as a diplomatic mission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea under the present situation that the diplomatic ties have not been established between the DPRK and Japan.
					
					 The statement said that from the formation of Chongryon up to this date the successive Japanese governments and right-wing reactionaries have made all sorts of misdeeds against Chongryon organizations and Koreans in Japan, but they did not fire at the Central Hall of Chongryon, the inviolable area in which the DPRK's sovereignty is exercised.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Japanese right-wing gangsters' terrorism against the Central Hall of Chongryon is not merely an accident but a deliberate politically-motivated provocation and heinous crime against the DPRK and Chongryon committed by the Japanese reactionaries with the sinister intention to extremely strain the situation on the Korean peninsula and revive militarism and realize their old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" taking advantage of it.
					
					 The Japanese authorities are misleading public opinion as if the recent incident happened by an individual body and person while investigating the criminals arrested but it is little short of a clumsy excuse to cover up their sinister intention.
					
					 It is an open challenge to the DPRK and a prelude to overall crackdown upon Chongryon that the Japanese authorities made right-wing gangsters fire at the hall, not content with making desperate efforts to realize their impossible pipedream.
					
					 The more desperately the Japanese reactionaries go in their moves against the DPRK and Chongryon, the more clearly they reveal their despicable true color as disturber of peace and war servant before the world.
					
					 The Japanese authorities would be well advised to disclose the background and truth behind the shooting spree to the end, mete out a stern punishment to the chief culprits and accomplices and take a special measure to prevent the reoccurrence of violent crime and terrorism against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blames U.S. and Japanese Reactionaries for Reckless War Hysteria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blames U.S. and Japanese Reactionaries for Reckless War Hysteria
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and Japanese warmongers staged "combined air-defence and missile-shielding drill" from Feb. 16 to 23.
					 In the war gamble they went frantic with joint detection, tracking and interception of the DPRK's ballistic rockets and fighters through the coordinated operation of the air-defence networks of the U.S. and Japan, interception drill of Patriot missile units under the Japan Air "Self-Defense Force" and the emergency sortie drill of fighters.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Sunday says that the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries' reckless act is the dangerous military provocation for spoiling the hard-won atmosphere for improvement of the north-south relations and peace on the Korean peninsula and provoking a war.
					
					 Noting that it is the headache for the U.S. obsessed with its stratagem for dominating Asia-Pacific and Japanese reactionaries going frantic with moves for reviving militarism and reinvasion that the situation on the Korean peninsula is eased, it goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to realize its ambition for hegemony at any cost by building up armed forces in the Asia-Pacific region and staging frantic war exercises under the pretext of the "threat" from someone.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are also foolishly trying to realize their old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" with the backing of their U.S. master overheated with war fever.
					
					 The U.S. and Japanese reactionaries' reckless war hysteria clearly proves who the arch criminal bringing clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula is while disturbing the reconciliation and unity of the Korean nation.
					
					 Tiger moth fond of playing with fire is bound to perish in the flames.
					
					 The U.S. and Japanese reactionaries should stop acting rashly, properly understanding who their rival is.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Military Warmaniacs Accused of Trying to Resume Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Military Warmaniacs Accused of Trying to Resume Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary denounces the U.S. for trying to resume joint military exercises in collusion with the south Korean military warmongers under the veil of annual ones.
					 The commentary says that it is the dangerous reckless act bringing the situation on the Korean peninsula in which the climate of detente is created back to the super tensions that the U.S. tries to resume joint military exercises by instigating south Korean military warmongers.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is going to kick off nuclear war exercises at any cost, going against the climate of detente on the Korean peninsula. Its act is designed to bedevil the situation by fanning up confrontation between the north and the south and provide justification for open interference in south Korea and keep up strategic control over it which is shaken to its foundation.
					
					 The joint maneuvers are a heinous aggression war, nuclear war of the U.S. which works hard to impose nuclear disaster upon the Korean nation and stain the inviolable land of the DPRK with the blood of its people, both in name and in reality.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK can never allow them. If the U.S. resumes the joint military exercises together with the south Korean puppet forces, all the army and people of the DPRK will resolutely cope with them.
					
					 On the same day, Minju Joson says in a commentary that if the U.S. resumes the joint military exercises with south Korea, all the service personnel and people of the DPRK will resolutely take the toughest countermeasures to mete out a merciless punishment to the U.S., sworn enemy of peace and reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house of Kuwait on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is a principled requirement for victoriously advancing Korean revolution to continue to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and clarifies the task to steadily develop the Party into the glorious party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Feb. 6.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Poland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Poland
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Strengthening the People's Army and Creating a Social Climate in Which Prominence Is Given to Military Affairs" was posted by the International Friendship Initiative "Explore DPRK" of Poland on its website on Feb. 7 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The work, published on Feb. 4, Juche 81 (1992), deals with the issue of holding a large-scale military parade to celebrate the 60th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army in the presence of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for strengthening the People's Army and creating a social climate in which prominence is given to military affairs.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Though Comrade Kim Jong Il passed away, his undying feats will go down to posterity forever. 
					 Raja Collure, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Sri Lanka, said this in a statement issued on Feb. 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The whole world recognizes him as a prominent statesman who led the Korean people in the stormy days of history, the statement said, adding:
					
					 He strengthened the country into an impregnable socialist fortress, keeping to the road illumined by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He built the Workers' Party of Korea as a mighty political organization supported and trusted by the people. It is his great feat.
					
					 He devoted himself to the improvement of the people's standard of living.
					
					 The groundwork for the self-supporting economy of the country was firmly laid and the DPRK has demonstrated to the whole world its might as politico-ideological power and military power under his leadership.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star, Day of Army Founding Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star, Day of Army Founding Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Functions were held in different countries to celebrate the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Celebrations, seminars, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Romania, Germany, the UK, the Czech Republic, DR Congo, Benin and Nigeria from Jan. 31 to Feb. 16.
					
					 On display at the venues were photos dealing with the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on show there were works of the great leaders and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and books and photos introducing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants in the film shows watched Korean films including "Kimjongilia".
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the world progressives praise Kim Jong Il, who put his heart and soul into the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and global independence throughout his revolutionary life, as a gifted thinker and theoretician, extraordinary statesman and iron-willed brilliant commander.
					
					 The chief and members of the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany said that Kim Jong Il published many works through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities to illumine the road ahead of mankind.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events in the UK.

articles.title: Delegacion de alto nivel de la RPDC visitara al Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Delegacion de alto nivel de la RPDC visitara al Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- La delegacion de alto nivel de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Chol, visitara al Sur de Corea para participar en la ceremonia de clausura de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.

articles.title: Delegacion de alto nivel de la RPDC sale de Pyongyang con rumbo al Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Delegacion de alto nivel de la RPDC sale de Pyongyang con rumbo al Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- La delegacion de alto nivel de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Chol, partio el dia 25 de esta capital para participar en la ceremonia de clausura de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.
					La delegacion es integrada por el presidente del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, Ri Son Gwon, y otros acompanantes.
					
					Despues de su llegada a Kaesong, la delegacion emprendio sobre las 9 y media el viaje al Sur de Corea.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX rechaza nueva medida de sancion anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX rechaza nueva medida de sancion anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 25 la siguiente declaracion:
					En su mensaje del Ano Nuevo, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un expuso su voluntad de mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur de Corea, preparar la atmosfera pacifica en la Peninsula Coreana y esforzarse mucho por la apertura exitosa de los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales en Phyongchang del Sur de Corea.
					
					Gracias al noble amor por la nacion de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC y su valiente decision de defender la paz, se realizaron despues de largo tiempo el dialogo y la cooperacion entre ambas partes coreanas y se efectuaron con exito los actos de la Olimpiada con las fuerzas unidas de las mismas.
					
					Sin embargo, en visperas de la clausura del festival deportivo, Estados Unidos toma la medida de sancion anti-RPDC de gran dimension intentando traer el nubarron de confrontacion y guerra a la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Al publicar la medida de sancion fundamentada en bloquear totalmente el comercio maritimo de nuestro pais con otros, Trump nos amenazo abiertamente disparateando que si esa no surte efectos, pasara a la accion de la "segunda etapa muy violenta".
					
					Es una muestra de ignorancia sobre nuestro pais el mismo intento de la camarilla de Trump de asustarnos con esa medida de sancion o disparate.
					
					La RPDC se dispuso de armas nucleares, medio de justicia, para defenderse precisamente desde tal amenaza de EE.UU.
					
					Como hemos declarado en varias ocasiones, consideraremos cualquier bloqueo como acto de guerra y no disuadiremos a EE.UU. si este tiene de veras el coraje de enfrentarse de manera "violenta" con nuestro pais.
					
					Si EE.UU. incurre en el acto provocador contra nuestro pais despreciando todos nuestros gestos de buena fe y esfuerzos por desarrollar positivamente las relaciones intercoreanas acorde al deseo de todos los coreanos y por defender la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana, controlaremos a EE.UU. con el modo de reaccion por el estilo nuestro aunque este imperio asuma la actitud violenta o feroz.
					
					En el caso de que se ponga de nuevo al umbral de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana debido a la conducta imprudente de EE.UU., este sera la victima de todos los desastres que se produzcan como consecuencia de ello.

articles.title: Portavoz del CCPAP exige a autoridades japonesas tomar medidas especiales
articles.content:
Portavoz del CCPAP exige a autoridades japonesas tomar medidas especiales
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, llega a la etapa muy grave la histerica campana de las autoridades y los reaccionarios derechistas de Japon contra la RPDC y la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon).
					 Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) publico el dia 25 una declaracion condenatoria que sigue:
					
					  Sobre las 3 y 50 de la madrugada del pasado dia 23, dos elementos derechistas armados de Japon cometieron el acto terrorista de disparar varias balas hacia la casa que sirve de sede del Presidium del Comite Central de la Chongryon.
					
					  El Presidium del CC de la Chongryon representa la dignidad y los intereses de esta organizacion y los coreanos residentes en Japon y cumple la funcion de mision diplomatica de la RPDC, ya que no existen las relaciones diplomaticas entre Corea y Japon.
					
					Desde la constitucion de la Chongryon hasta la fecha, los sucesivos gobiernos japoneses y los reaccionarios derechistas del mismo pais cometieron maldades de toda indole contra la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon, pero no se atrevieron a tirotear hacia la Casa Central de la Chongryon, sagrada zona bajo la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					El atentado terrorista reportado esta vez no es el simple caso accidental sino una provocacion politica intencional y el peor crimen que cometieron los reaccionarios japoneses contra la RPDC y la Chongryon con el siniestro objetivo de agravar al maximo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y realizar, tomandola por pretexto, su anejada ambicion de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental".
					
					En el curso de investigacion a los criminales arrestados, las autoridades japonesas enganan a la opinion publica hablando como si el atentado fuera obra de alguna entidad o individuo. Pero, esta insistencia no pasa de ser una excusa para disimular su intencion malsana.
					
					En su intento de hacer realidad su sueno ilusorio, ellas instigaron a los gangsteres derechistas armados por si mismas a disparar contra la Casa Central de la Chongryon, lo cual significa un desafio abierto a la RPDC y el preludio de la represion total contra esa organizacion.
					
					Mientras los reaccionarios japoneses se pongan mas feroces en la campana anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon, se pondra con mas claridad a la vista del mundo el asqueroso atributo de Japon como destructor de la paz y sirviente de guerra.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deberan esclarecer de punta a cabo el motivo trasero y las verdaderas facetas del incidente, castigar duro a los autores y sus complices y tomar las medidas especiales para que no se repitan mas nunca los crimenes violentos y terroristas contra la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en el pais isla.
